TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GlyphTypeface extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 指定对应于一个字体文件在磁盘上的物理字体。

span.span: Specifies a physical font face that corresponds to a font file on the disk.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象是对应于一种字体系列所表示的 OpenType 字体文件，或在文档中的内存块形式序列化的单个面部的低级别的文本对象。The object is a low level text object that corresponds to a single face of a font family as represented by an OpenType font file, or serialized as a block of memory in a document. 正确要用于给定的逻辑字体中字符的运行通常由[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]字体系统并记录在生成的对象对象和行格式设置文本[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]。The correct to use for a run of characters in a given logical font is normally determined by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] font system and recorded in the objects generated by the object and line formatting text [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]. 提供属性和方法：The provides properties and methods for: - 获取字体的常见规格，如上升或下降 em 大小的比率。Obtaining font face common metrics, such as the ratio of ascent and descent to em size. - 获取度量值、 轮廓和单个标志符号位图。Obtaining metrics, outlines, and bitmaps for individual glyphs. - 在文档中的序列化。Serialization in a document. 以下列表描述的类型的应用程序方案，展示了使用低级别的值控制对象提供。The following list describes the type of application scenarios that illustrate the value of using the low-level control that the object provides. - 固定的格式文档生成器可能会使用为嵌入在文档容器中获取的字体的二进制图像A fixed format document generator may use the to obtain a binary image of the font for embedding in a document container - 打印机驱动程序可能会使用获取字体标志符号轮廓或位图或整个字体图像可查看将发送到打印机。A printer driver may use the to obtain font glyph outlines or bitmaps, or the entire font image for sending to the printer. - 一个查看器应用程序可能会使用获取指标和位图的信息。A viewer application may use the to obtain metric and bitmap information. 每个字形定义度量值，指定与其他的对齐方式。Each glyph defines metrics that specify how it aligns with other . 以下图形定义标志符号字符的指标值。The following graphic defines metric values for glyph characters. ![标志符号度量示意图](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "标志符号度量示意图")![Diagraph of glyph measurements](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "Diagraph of glyph measurements") 指标值的标志符号字符Metric values of glyph characters

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified font file location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个新对象从指定的 OpenType 字体`typefaceSource`。This constructor creates a new object from an OpenType font face specified by `typefaceSource`. 构造对象不使用样式模拟。The constructed object does not use style simulations. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建的新实例类通过指定的字体文件位置。The following example shows how to create a new instance of the class by specifying a font file location. [!code-csharp[GlyphTypefaceSnippets#GlyphTypefaceSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GlyphTypefaceSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#glyphtypefacesnippet1)] [!code-vb[GlyphTypefaceSnippets#GlyphTypefaceSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GlyphTypefaceSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#glyphtypefacesnippet1)]

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that specifies the location of the font file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个新对象从指定的 OpenType 字体`typefaceSource`和`styleSimulations`。This constructor creates a new object from an OpenType font face specified by `typefaceSource` and `styleSimulations`.

span.span: Gets the baseline value for the .

value.span: 类型的值表示基线的。

span.span: A value of type that represents the baseline.

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::UInt16, double> ^ BottomSideBearings { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::UInt16, double> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取从黑盒下边缘到步进向量所表示的标志符号的底端的距离对象。

span.span: Gets the distance from bottom edge of the black box to the bottom end of the advance vector for the glyphs represented by the object.

value.span: 对象，包含键/值对表示距离信息。

span.span: An object that contains key/value pairs that represent distance information.

value.span: 关键是标识标志符号。

span.span: The key is a that identifies the glyph.

value.span: 值是表示的距离。

span.span: The value is a that represents the distance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 黑色框的下边缘时定义的步进宽度和字体单元格高度的对齐矩形中，值为正。The value is positive when the bottom edge of the black box is within the alignment rectangle defined by the advance width and font cell height. 字体单元格高度是垂直布局中的水平维度。The font cell height is a horizontal dimension in vertical layout. 黑色框的下边缘延伸对齐矩形之外时，值为负。The value is negative when the bottom edge of the black box overhangs the alignment rectangle.

span.span: A that indicates the distance from the baseline to the top of an English capital letter, expressed as a fraction of the font em size.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RightSideBearings As IDictionary(Of UShort, Double)
public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::UInt16, double> ^ RightSideBearings { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::UInt16, double> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取从右边缘的距离，由表示的标志符号的步进向量右端到对象。

span.span: Gets the distance from the right edge of the black box to the right end of the advance vector for the glyphs represented by the object.

value.span: 对象，包含键/值对表示距离信息。

span.span: An object that contains key/value pairs that represent distance information.

value.span: 关键是标识标志符号索引。

span.span: The key is a that identifies the glyph index.

value.span: 值是表示的距离。

span.span: The value is a that represents the distance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尾随边缘的黑色框时定义的步进宽度和字体单元格高度的对齐矩形中，值为正。The value is positive when the trailing edge of the black box is within the alignment rectangle defined by the advance width and font cell height. 右边缘延伸对齐矩形之外时，值为负。The value is negative when the right edge of the black box overhangs the alignment rectangle.

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^, System::String ^> ^ SampleTexts { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取的示例文本信息对象。

span.span: Gets the sample text information for the object.

value.span: 对象，包含键/值对示例文本信息。

span.span: An object that contains key/value pairs sample text information.

value.span: 键是标识区域性的一个 对象。

span.span: The key is a object that identifies the culture.

value.span: 值为一个字符串，描述示例文本信息。

span.span: The value is a string that describes the sample text information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值可以是字体名称或在设计器会认为是最佳的示例，若要显示的字体中的任何其他文本。The value can be the font name, or any other text that the designer thinks is the best sample to display the font in.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示从基线到字样删除线的距离。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the distance from the baseline to the strikethrough for the typeface.

value.span: 一个表示删除线位置的 。

span.span: A that represents the strikethrough position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 删除线位置值通常为正因为删除线通常高于基准。The strikethrough position value is usually positive because the strikethrough is generally above the baseline.

span.span: A that indicates the strikethrough thickness, expressed as a fraction of the font em size.

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::UInt16, double> ^ TopSideBearings { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::UInt16, double> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取从垂直步进向量的顶端到黑盒上边缘所表示的标志符号的距离对象。

span.span: Gets the distance from the top end of the vertical advance vector to the top edge of the black box for the glyphs represented by the object.

value.span: 对象，包含键/值对表示距离信息。

span.span: An object that contains key/value pairs that represent distance information.

value.span: 关键是标识标志符号索引。

span.span: The key is a that identifies the glyph index.

value.span: 值是表示的距离。

span.span: The value is a that represents the distance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 黑色框的上边缘时定义的步进高度和字体单元格高度的对齐矩形中，值为正。The value is positive when the top edge of the black box is within the alignment rectangle defined by the advance height and font cell height. 字体单元格高度是垂直布局中的水平维度。The font cell height is a horizontal dimension in vertical layout. 黑色框的上边缘延伸对齐矩形之外时，值为负。The value is negative when the top edge of the black box overhangs the alignment rectangle.

value.span: 键是标识区域性的一个 对象。

span.span: The key is a object that identifies the culture.

span.span: The value is a string that the trademark notice information.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UnderlinePosition As Double

summary.span: 获取位置中的下划线。

span.span: Gets the position of the underline in the .

value.span: 一个值，该值表示的下划线位置。

span.span: A value that represents the position of the underline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下划线位置是相对于基线和相对于 em 大小。The underline position is relative to the baseline and relative to the em size. 返回的位置值是通常是负面的因为下划线通常低于基线。The returned position value is usually negative because an underline is usually below the baseline.

span.span: Gets the vendor URL information for the object.

value.span: 表示供应商 URL 信息的对象，其中包含键/值对。

span.span: An object that contains key/value pairs that represent vendor URL information.

value.span: 键是标识区域性的一个 对象。

span.span: The key is a object that identifies the culture.

value.span: 值为引用供应商 URL 的字符串。

span.span: The value is a string that references a vendor URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字体供应商可以在 URL，然后可以用来注册该字体中嵌入唯一的序列号。A font vendor could embed a unique serial number in the URL, which could then be used to register the font.

summary.span: 获取的版本字符串信息对象解释的字体的 NAME 表中。

span.span: Gets the version string information for the object interpreted from the font's 'NAME' table.

value.span: 对象，包含键/值对表示版本字符串信息。

span.span: An object that contains key/value pairs that represent version string information.

value.span: 键是标识区域性的一个 对象。

span.span: The key is a object that identifies the culture.

value.span: 值为一个表示版本字符串。

span.span: The value is a string that represents the version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本字符串在格式有显著变化。Version strings vary significantly in format. 若要获取的数字值形式的版本，请使用-不尝试分析的值属性。To obtain the version as a numeric value, use the - do not attempt to parse the value of the property.

value.span: 类型的值表示字体的粗细。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Win32FaceNames As IDictionary(Of CultureInfo, String)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^, System::String ^> ^ Win32FaceNames { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取所表示的字体的 Win32 字体名称对象。

span.span: Gets the Win32 face name for the font represented by the object.

value.span: 对象，其中包含表示 Win32 字体名称信息的键/值对。

span.span: An object that contains key/value pairs that represent Win32 face name information.

value.span: 键是标识区域性的一个 对象。

span.span: The key is a object that identifies the culture.

value.span: 值是一个表示 Win32 字体名称的字符串。

span.span: The value is a string that represents the Win32 face name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果字体不提供指定语言的名称，将以英语返回的字体名称。If the font does not provide a name for the specified language, it returns the face name in English. Win32 字体名称可识别权重 （不是常规或以粗体显示），和/或样式，但不是会标识 stretch 或其他权重。The Win32 face name may identify weights (other than regular or bold), and/or style, but may not identify stretch or other weights.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Win32FamilyNames As IDictionary(Of CultureInfo, String)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^, System::String ^> ^ Win32FamilyNames { System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取所表示的字体的 Win32 系列名称对象。

span.span: Gets the Win32 family name for the font represented by the object.

value.span: 对象，其中包含表示 Win32 系列名称信息的键/值对。

span.span: An object that contains key/value pairs that represent Win32 family name information.

value.span: 键是标识区域性的一个 对象。

span.span: The key is a object that identifies the culture.

value.span: 值是一个表示 Win32 系列名称的字符串。

span.span: The value is a string that represents the Win32 family name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果字体不会为指定的语言，提供系列名称属性将以英语返回家族名称。If the font does not provide a family name for the specified language, the property returns the family name in English. Win32 系列名称不包括常规或加粗的权重和样式，但它包含其他权重和 stretch。The Win32 family name excludes regular or bold weights and style, but it includes other weights and stretch.
